So <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/custom-fonts#:~:text=you%2C%20and%20the-,fonts.json,-file%20will%20need|this reference> seems to be incorrect. Or I could be misunderstanding something about how HubSpot detects .json files in the fonts folder.
I'm also trying to get this to work and I'm not sure which is correct. So far I'm not having success with either spelling and wondering if something else might be off in the docs
